dcterms:creator: Zeerak Waseem
Dirk Hovy
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of tweets with sexist tweets collected from Twitter by searching for tweets that contain common terms pertaining to sexism such as 'feminazi.' The tweets were then annotated by experts based on criteria founded in critical race theory.
dcterms:title: Sexist Tweets (st)

dcterms:creator: Antigoni-Maria Founta
Constantinos Djouvas
Despoina Chatzakou
Ilias Leontiadis
Jeremy Blackburn
Gianluca Stringhini
Athena Vakali
Michael Sirivianos
Nicolas Kourtellis
dcterms:description: A large scale crowdsourced abusive tweet dataset with 60K tweets, systematically annotated to identify abusive behaviors in Twitter.
dcterms:title: Abusive Tweets (abt)
